comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

When the an event's reminder starts, the alarm sound plays twice. This happens for every event alarm, so if the dialog window has three events, you'll hear the alarm sound 6 times!


Actual results:

Alarm sound played multiple times for each alarm.


Expected results:

Sound should have played exactly the number of times that there was an event in the alarm dialog.
comments.creator: donrhummy@yahoo.com
comments.author: donrhummy@yahoo.com
